ComicInfo.Summary:
A woman's infant child was kidnapped by extortionist, who demanded $100,000 or they'd sell the baby on the black market. The woman contacts the Solution to try to solve her problem, but she is unable to afford their fee. The woman's story moves Dropkick, though, and he offers to handle this case for free and on his own. Shadowmage and Tech offer assistance: Shadowmage gives Dropkick four different spells that he could only use once and Tech gave him leads on the baby's whereabouts. Dropkick roughs up some thugs and gets information on the location of the kidnappers. He continues on his mission until he finds the actual kidnappers. After evading gunshots from all over, Dropkick finds the baby and is able to escape.
In a backup story, the origin of the Strangers is told.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/solution-5-its-a-hard-world/4000-38489/
ComicInfo.Title: It's a Hard World; Origin
ComicInfo.Writer: James D. Hudnall,Steve Englehart,James Hudnall,James Hudnall,Steve Englehart
